de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISSend


  • public interface ISSend
    English:
    describes the object to send mails (the default outgoing channel).

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sendMonitored

        boolean sendMonitored(Connection con,
                    Email email,
                    int subprojectid,
                    boolean save,
                    boolean cc,
                    boolean bcc)
                      throws SQLException
        Sends a email, if a operator or a subproject is don't monitored
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        email - email to send
        tid - id of a subproject that can be monitored and contains SMTP data
        save - true, if a email should be stored after sending
        cc - if you have email format in cc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this.
        bcc - if you have email format in bcc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this
        Returns:
        boolean true, if a email was sent
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • sendDirectly

        boolean sendDirectly(Connection con,
                   Email email,
                   int subprojectid,
                   boolean save,
                   boolean wantsError,
                   boolean fromEmaildeamonForForwarding,
                   boolean cc,
                   boolean bcc,
                   boolean forwarding)
                     throws SQLException
        Sends a email
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        email - email to send
        subprojectid - id of a subproject that contains SMTP data
        save - true, if a email should be stored after sending
        wantsError - true, if you want to show a error, if sent was failed
        fromEmaildeamonForForwarding - true, if a email is forwarding from email demon
        cc - if you have email format in cc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this.
        bcc - if you have email format in bcc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this
        forwarding - true, if a email should be forwarded
        Returns:
        boolean true, if a email was sent
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • send

        boolean send(Connection con,
           Email emailToSend,
           int subprojectid,
           boolean save,
           boolean wantsError,
           boolean fromEmaildeamonForForwarding,
           boolean cc,
           boolean bcc,
           Customer customer)
             throws SQLException
        Sends a email
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        Email - email to send
        subprojectid - id of a subproject that contains SMTP data
        save - true, if a email should be stored after sending
        wantsError - true, if you want to show a error, if sent was failed
        fromEmaildeamonForForwarding - true, if a email is forwarding from email demon
        cc - if you have email format in cc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this.
        bcc - if you have email format in bcc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this
        customer - customer data to resolve customer mx-tags
        Returns:
        boolean true, if a email was sent
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • send

        boolean send(Connection con,
           Email emailToSend,
           int subprojectid,
           boolean save,
           boolean wantsError,
           boolean fromEmaildeamonForForwarding,
           boolean cc,
           boolean bcc,
           Customer customer,
           boolean forwarding)
             throws SQLException
        Sends a email
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        emailToSend - email to send
        subprojectid - id of a subproject that contains SMTP data
        save - true, if a email should be stored after sending
        wantsError - true, if you want to show a error, if sent was failed
        fromEmaildeamonForForwarding - true, if a email is forwarding from email demon
        cc - if you have email format in cc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this.
        bcc - if you have email format in bcc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this
        customer - customer data to resolve customer mx-tags
        forwarding - true, if a email should be forwarded
        Returns:
        boolean true, if a email was sent
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • createSMTPMessageAttachment

        Attachment createSMTPMessageAttachment(Connection con,
                                     Object obj,
                                     int projectId)
                                       throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException,
                                              javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                              SQLException,
                                              IOException
        Creates a email file from a object (object is question or answer)
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        obj - question or answer to creates a file
        projectId - project id of a object
        Returns:
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        javax.mail.MessagingException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • sendDirectlyFromProject

        boolean sendDirectlyFromProject(Connection con,
                              int projectId,
                              Email emailToSend,
                              boolean fromEmaildeamonForForwarding,
                              boolean cc,
                              boolean bcc,
                              boolean forward)
                                throws SQLException
        Sends a email
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        email - email to send
        projectId - id of a project that contains SMTP settings
        fromEmaildeamonForForwarding - true, if a email is forwarding from email demon
        cc - if you have email format in cc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this.
        bcc - if you have email format in bcc like "abc@email.de{1", a customer with a id 1 will be generated. false, if you don't want this
        forwarding - true, if a email should be forwarded
        Returns:
        boolean true, if a email was sent
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an database error occurs
